## Testing

### Test Coverage
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Edge cases covered
- [ ] Integration tests updated if needed

### Manual Testing
- [ ] Tested locally with `clarinet check`
- [ ] Tested locally with `npm test`
- [ ] Tested on devnet
- [ ] Tested on testnet (if applicable)

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] No unnecessary console.logs or debug code
- [ ] Line endings are LF (Unix style) for .clar files

### Documentation
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] Inline code comments added/updated
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated
- [ ] Breaking changes documented

### Security
- [ ] No secrets or private keys committed
- [ ] Security implications considered
- [ ] CEI pattern followed (for contract changes)
- [ ] Authorization checks implemented
